text: Mariyu (kapata visvasulalo) kondaru (visvasulaku) hani kaligincataniki, satyatiraskara vaikharini (balaparacataniki) mariyu visvasulanu vidadiyataniki, allah mariyu ayana sandesaharunito intaku mundu poradina varu ponci undataniki, oka masjid nirmincaru. Mariyu varu: "Ma uddesam melu ceyatam tappa maremi kadu!" Ani gatti pramanalu kuda cestunnaru. Kani varu vastavanga asatyavadulani allah saksyamistunnadu
